
---
title: '首发 2988 元，华硕破晓 Pro 13 开启预约：OLED 屏，双雷电 4 接口'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/2608ae85-7430-4048-b7a1-83364b56b0ab.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sun, 29 May 2022 06:13:47 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/2608ae85-7430-4048-b7a1-83364b56b0ab.png'
---

<div>   
<div class="tougao-user">感谢IT之家网友 <a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1297186" rel="nofollow">肖战割割</a>、<a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D2029428" rel="nofollow">华南吴彦祖</a>、<a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1894528" rel="nofollow">会飞的小笼包</a> 的线索投递！</div>
            <p data-vmark="ea1e"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 5 月 29 日消息，华硕破晓 Pro13 现已上架并开启预约，预售到手 2988 元。</p><p data-vmark="4b4c" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/2608ae85-7430-4048-b7a1-83364b56b0ab.png" w="746" h="1156" title="首发 2988 元，华硕破晓 Pro 13 开启预约：OLED 屏，双雷电 4 接口" width="746" height="1156" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="a351">据介绍，该机搭载英特尔酷睿 i3-1115G4 处理器（锐炬 Xe 核显），配备 8G DDR4-3200 内存 + 256G PCIe 3.0 SSD（内存最高扩展至 40G / SSD 双槽位），采用 13.3 英寸 FHD 分辨率 OLED 屏，400nit 亮度，100% DCI-P3 色域，支持 180° 开合。</p><p data-vmark="2c8f" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/fb98f689-3009-4371-974b-a94e6961ff58.png" w="748" h="780" title="首发 2988 元，华硕破晓 Pro 13 开启预约：OLED 屏，双雷电 4 接口" width="748" height="780" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="28fe">其他方面，该机配备 66Wh 电池，支持 65W PD 快充，采用金属材质，厚 16.9mm，重 1.2kg，支持 Number Pad 数字键盘触控板，键盘背光，支持 Windows Hello，电源键集成指纹识别，提供 2× 雷电 4、HDMI 2.0、USB-A 3.2 Gen 2、mini RJ45、3.5mm 耳机口等。</p><p data-vmark="dce2" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/c5d8ad1d-4f9e-407f-930b-e11e3089266e.png" w="749" h="784" title="首发 2988 元，华硕破晓 Pro 13 开启预约：OLED 屏，双雷电 4 接口" width="749" height="784" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="10045405385188"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/181252/37/25552/272580/628f8842E30bc7ef3/b7eed561c3190c92.jpg" title="首发 2988 元，华硕破晓 Pro 13 开启预约：OLED 屏，双雷电 4 接口" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">华硕破晓 Pro13 13.3 英寸</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">券后 2988 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">领 300 元券</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
